The claim made by Donald Trump is that t: 11 hijackers knew what was going to happen and returned to Saudi Arabia two days before the attacks to watch their husbands on television flying the planes.
The expert: s verdict highlights that Trump's claim is not consistent with the findings of the 9/11 Commission and does not stand up to scrutiny.
The 9: 11 Commission report also concluded that most of the hijackers had broken off regular contact with their families, except for one hijacker who had a girlfriend living in Germany.
